snippet.title: Farewell North - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the Farewell North release date trailer, announcing that the upcoming narrative adventure game is coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Series X/S on August 15, 2024. 

Embark on a new adventure and play as border collie, Chesley, as you explore an open-world set in the Scottish Highlands with your owner. Chesley is doing his best to bring color back into his owners life in this story about loss and mental health. This trailer was revealed at the Future Games Show 2024.

#FarewellNorth #Gaming #GameTrailers
